Title: Shooting the Prodigal
Writer: Deborah Hocutt, David E. Powers, Greg Womble
Actors: Sterling Hurst, Paul Wilson, Christie Osterhus, Micah Brown
Plot: A brash young Jewish filmmaker from New York tries to help an overly-zealous Baptist preacher in south Alabama make a movie about the Prodigal Son. In the process they both learn about the love and acceptance of the Prodigal's father.
